[{'company': {'id': 3614, 'name': 'TNO', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFobKDECbgbEQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1688455653111?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=ho1ffvJJOaiufyZS54sM9jND_CnKpQ7s15LCXPTNO0Q', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/tno/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'TNO', 'description': '▪ Lead research scientist, recent joint industry projects: 
1) Carboniferous, Zechstein and Jurassic plays in the Dutch offshore. GEODE Atlas Phase 1, an open digital resource atlas. Collaboration between TNO and EBN (2021-2022). https://www.geodeatlas.nl/
2) Understanding Z2 carbonate platforms, stratigraphy and paleogeography in the Dutch Northern Offshore (Zephyr Project, 2022). https://kennisbank.ebn.nl/en/zephyr-zechstein-play-project-2021/
3) Chalk structural and depositional evolution in the vicinity of salt tectonics structures in the Dutch offshore and onshore: Geophysical and Geological characterisation (CREST Project, 2019-2021). 
4) Stratigraphic, source rock and tectonostratigraphic characterisation of the Lower Carboniferous in the Central and Southern North Sea (PALEO-FIVE Project, 2020). 
5) Tectonostratigraphy and paleogeography of the Dutch Central Graben during the Late Jurassic (MAXIM Project, 2019).
6) Burial and structuration analysis of the Dinantian carbonates in the Dutch subsurface (SCAN Geothermal Project, 2019).https://www.nlog.nl/sites/default/files/2019-09/scan_dinantian_burial_and_structuration_report.pdf
7) Characterisation of Upper Jurassic-Lower Cretaceous Sandstones, Dutch Offshore (FOCUS and COMMA Projects, 2016). https://www.nlog.nl/sites/default/files/2019-01/FOCUS_TNO_report_2016%20reduced.pdf and https://www.nlog.nl/sites/default/files/2019-12/comma_report_full-v2016.11.30.pdf
8) Early salt movement in the Dutch Offshore (STEM Project, 2017).
9) Tectono-stratigraphy of the Upper Carboniferous-Lower Permian in the northern Dutch offshore (NORTHERN OFFSHORE Project, 2016). https://www.nlog.nl/sites/default/files/2018-11/NORTHERN_OFFSHORE_TNO_report_2015_R10920_0.pdf
